original_text: But certain people have failed to live in that way. They would rather talk about things that do not help anyone.
korean_text: 사람들이 이에서 벗어나 헛된 말에 빠져

sentences.original_text: But certain people have failed to live in that way
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 사람들은 그렇게 살지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: They would rather talk about things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 차라리 것들에 대해 이야기하기를 원합니다
